PERM_isAccountOwner_DESC: They own the account. If they delete their account, the tenant goes with them.
PERM_isAccountOwner_DESC_FIRST_PERSON: You own the account. If you delete your account, the tenant goes with you.
PERM_isHelpRequestAdmin_DESC: Handles support tickets from site members.
PERM_isHelpRequestAdmin_DESC_FIRST_PERSO: You will be able to receive and resolve tickets from site members.
PERM_isBillingAdmin_DESC: Can view and update billing information.
PERM_isBillingAdmin_DESC_FIRST_PERSON: You can view and update billing information.
PERM_isAnalyticsAdmin_DESC_FIRST_PERSON: You can view the Analytics tab.
PERM_isCustomizationAdmin_DESC: Can add and edit the comment widget customizations.
PERM_isCustomizationAdmin_DESC_FIRST_PER: You can add and edit the comment widget customizations.
PERM_isManageDataAdmin_DESC: Can access the Data Management tab to import/export comments, setup webhooks, and perform migrations.
PERM_isManageDataAdmin_DESC_FIRST_PERSON: You can access the Data Management tab to import/export comments, setup webhooks, and perform migrations.
PERM_isAPIAdmin_DESC: Can view the API secret and API usage statistics.
PERM_isAPIAdmin_DESC_FIRST_PERSON: You can view the API secret and API usage statistics.
